name: Classic Manicure
description: Nail shaping, cuticle care, gentle exfoliation, and polish application.

name: Gel Manicure
description: Long-lasting gel polish manicure with nail shaping and cuticle treatment.

name: Classic Pedicure
description: Relaxing pedicure including cuticle care, callus removal, exfoliation, and polish.

name: Spa Pedicure
description: Luxurious pedicure with foot soak, scrub, mask, massage, and gel or classic polish.

name: Nail Art Design
description: Customized nail art with detailed, hand-painted designs or embellishments.
